name: ENEFTIVERSE
description: ENEFTIVERSE is a metaverse platform that offers a virtual reality experience for online users of all ages. Here you can buy and sell cryptocurrencies, trade NFTs, get hands-on training, and have fun! The first OLED VR glasses in Turkey! Experience the ENEFTIVERSE universe and many more metaverse applications with ENEFTI-VR. You don't need to pay incredible bucks anymore. Get a quality virtual reality experience for a more affordable price with ENEFTI-VR.
